item.title: Netflix OSS
item.description: Found this to be a particularly good episode of The Food Fight show with Jeremy Edberg and Adrian Cockcroft talking about the Netflix tools and architecture:

item.title: scaling at dropbox
item.description: I highly recommend this DevOps Weekly mail out. The latest one has a bunch of good links, and one i found especially was this “Scaling lessons learned at Dropbox, part 1“.

item.title: some fav Velocity talks
item.description: Velocity was on last week, and I was following along enviously on twitter - I'm making a promise to myself that I'll be along in person next year! Quite a few of the talks now appearing online - here's a couple I've watched so far..

item.title: Allspaw on Anticipation
